Name: 深渊公主 Release The Bride
About the game: The current version supports Gamepad and change keys! And easy mode! What will happen if you were a beautiful princess and you got kidnapped into the abyss by a monster just to get rid of your fiancé? That is what happened to her, she was only 15 years, she was able to call her fiancé for help but she chose to prove she is not weak, and from that moment her journey to get out of the abyss start. Move between lands Fight Enemies and bosses What?!! Revolution!! king of the abyss is sealed in a prison!! a new king appeared!! Discover who sealed the old king? and what is going on in the abyss? Can she get out of the abyss by herself?? Who is her fiancé? ● The horizontal jumping action of the hard core, it may not be easier than Celeste at all. ● The Game featuring new Attack System Gameplay by using Dash and Attack at same time ● Using dash will make you invisible for little time to avoid any Damage while touching tarps or Attacking enemies ● Pixel art side-scrolling action, with a new modern visual style. ● Tightly tuned 2D controls. dash, run, jump, and slash your way through even the most deadly Enemies. ● Explore many Different Lands Lava Land, Green Land, Trap Land, Bomb Land, Shadow Land, etc. that contain many different areas. ● Get Gluttony power to get powerful new skills! Blood slash, Light Strike and 100 Strike! ● Many enemies! and epic bosses! ● Many traps to avoid ● Many collectible want collect such as: Flying Strawberry: it will recover your health Wings: the currency in the abyss. Unique fruit: it will recover Gluttony power. Gluttony Star: it will give you a new skill.
